Question: The museum was created to preserve her father's image and reach out to millions of this person fans worldwide.
Hints: Years later, Diane went on to become the cofounder of The ____ Family Museum, with the aid of her children.
Arundel **** was a descendant of Robert d'Isigny, a Frenchman who had travelled to England with William the Conqueror in 1066.
His great-grandfather, Arundel Elias ****, had emigrated from Gowran, County Kilkenny, Ireland where he was born in 1801.
